Package backend.tradesystem.queries

Class TradeQuery

java.lang.Object
backend.tradesystem.Manager
backend.tradesystem.queries.TradeQuery
public class TradeQuery
extends Manager
For getting info about a specific trade

  • Constructor Summary

      Parameters:
      userFilePath - the user database file path
